# Orleans

> Building distributed applications using the Orleans virtual actor framework. Grains are the fundamental units encapsulating state and behavior with single-threaded execution guarantees. Orleans handles grain placement, activation, and lifecycle; scales elastically across servers with transparent fault tolerance.

*Topics available: 105*

- [Orleans benefits](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/benefits.md): Learn the many benefits of .NET Orleans.
- [Migrate from Orleans 3.x to 7.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/migration-guide.md): Learn about the new features in Orleans 7.0 and how to migrate your application from version 3.x.
- [Orleans overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/overview.md): An introduction to .NET Orleans.
